document.full_text: amgen inc and takeda pharmaceutical co ltd said their experimental drug, motesanib, had failed to improve overall survival in a late-stage study of patients with advanced lung cancer.
document.title: amgen, takeda drug fails advanced lung-cancer study
lines_and_colors: amgen inc and takeda pharmaceutical co ltd said their experimental drug, motesanib, had failed to improve overall survival in a late-stage study of patients with advanced lung cancer.
